alert.couponCannotBeApplied: We are sorry, this coupon cannot be applied at this time.
alert.emailAddressNotAvailable: We are sorry. Our records show that email address is taken already. If it's your email, and you've forgotten your password, get a temporary one by selecting the "Recover password" link.

label.orderSummaryTableSummary: Order summary includes subtotal, discounts, shipping, tax and total
label.savedAddressesSummary: Addresses that have previously been saved to account profile
label.savedCreditCardsSummary: Credit Cards that have previously been saved to account profile

subheading.orderDetailsAreUnavailable: Sorry, the order details are unavailable.

text.addressNicknameRequiredReason: Provide a nickname if you wish to save this address for future use.
text.addressLinkedToPayment: Your billing address is linked to your payment choice.

text.emailAddressRequiredReason: We require an email address to communicate with you about your order.
text.passwordSentText:
We have reset your password and it has been emailed to the provided address.

Please check your email for your temporary password. Once you are successfully logged in, you should change your password to something you will remember.
text.paymentNicknameRequiredReason: Provide a nickname if you wish to save this payment method for future use.
text.printOrderDetails: Please print your order for your records
text.securityCodeExplanation:
To make your online shopping experience even more secure, we require that you type in your credit card's 3 or 4 digit security code when you place an order.

It's easy to find your credit card's security code:
text.securityCodeExplanationForVisa:
Visa, Master Card, Discover
Look for the last three numbers in the signature panel on the back of your card.
text.securityCodeExplanationForAmex:
American Express
Look for the four digit number on the far right of the front of your card.
text.securityCodeLocation: The security code is on the back of the card for Visa, Master Card and Discover credit cards
text.securityCodeLocationAmEx: The security code is on the front of an American Express credit card
text.signMeUpDetails: Sign up for an account today and enjoy access to order history, store promotions and more.
text.orderDetailsAreUnavailableMessage: If you are a registered shopper, please log in to your account to view your order history. If you have placed an order as a guest shopper, please check your email for the order details.
